content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at Position (10, 20)
Consists of:
- Steam Engine at position (11, 20)
- Boiler at position (10, 21)
- Offshore Pump at position (9, 20)

### Copper Plate Mine at Position (15, 25)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (15, 25) and a Furnace at position (16, 25)
- Burner Mining Drill at position (15, 26) and a Furnace at position (16, 26)
- Burner Mining Drill at position (15, 27) and a Furnace at position (16, 27)

### Iron Plate Mine at Position (20, 30)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (20, 30) and a Furnace at position (21, 30)
- Burner Mining Drill at position (20, 31) and a Furnace at position (21, 31)

### Copper Cable Factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (25, 35) and a Furnace at position (26, 35)
- Assembling Machine at position (27, 35) and Inserter at position (28, 35) that puts into the Assembling Machine
- Belt group connecting the Furnace at position (26, 35) to the Assembling Machine at position (27, 35)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when Using Extracting but Being Too Far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when Placing into a Tile which is Occupied by Another Entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors with Incorrect API Usage
- Verify the API documentation to ensure correct function calls and parameters are used.

### Errors in Conveyor Belt Direction
- Double-check the direction of conveyor belts to ensure they are aligned with the intended flow of materials.

## NAMESPACE

### Utility Functions
- `place_entity(entity_type: str, position: Tuple[int, int]) -> bool`: Attempts to place an entity of the specified type at the given position. Returns `True` if successful, `False` otherwise. Common failure mode: Attempting to place on an occupied tile.
- `extract_items(entity_id: int) -> List[Item]`: Extracts items from the specified entity. Ensure proximity to the entity to avoid errors.

### Important Variables
- `current_position: Tuple[int, int]`: Tracks the agent's current position on the map.
- `inventory: Dict[str, int]`: Maintains a count of items in the agent's inventory.
- `energy_level: int`: Represents the current energy level available for operations.
